titles: A Modest answer to a printed pamphlet, intituled, A speech lately made by a noble peer of the realm
notes: The "Speech" of the Earl of Shaftesbury on 23 Dec. 1680 is erroneously attributed to Francis Smith by Halkett & Laing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
